creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark, formerly acquired to honor Mr and Mrs Yutaka Aso for their friendship
description: vertical squarish, thin form with vertical ripples near upper corner; triangular cutout at center of bottom edge; mounted to light wooden base
marks: Signature back corner, incised under glaze: [S. Fukami]
title: Between the Waves
